data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of South Andaman. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary: On average, 19 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of South Andaman to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Sentinelese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.focus_label: South Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of South Andaman are far from Jesus.
